customer_name: Claude H Davis I I I

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1130 on
19-OCT-17.The licensee was contacted by telephone and was unavailable for the remainder of the day.
